name: xorcom

stmt.origin: 3bitr4i(wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w1, w0), wn(wb(w0, w1)), wn(wb(w1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w1, w0))
-| wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wn(wb(w1, w0)))
-| wb(wxo(w0, w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w0), wn(wb(w1, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w1, w0))
-| wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wn(wb(w1, w0)))
-| wb(wxo(w0, w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w0), wn(wb(w1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wn(wb(w0, w1)), wn(wb(w1, w0)))
-| wb(wb(w0, w1), wb(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w1, w0))
-| wb(wxo(w0, w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w0), wn(wb(w1, w0)))
-| wb(wb(w0, w1), wb(w1, w0))

|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w1, w0))
-| wb(wxo(w0, w1), wn(wb(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w0), wn(wb(w1, w0)))

|- wb(wxo(w0, w1), wxo(w1, w0))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w0), wn(wb(w1, w0)))

comment: The connector ` \/_ ` is commutative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2016.)
